meanings.sent1: Sheetrocking can be hard work, but it makes the walls smooth.
meanings.sent2: The sheetrocking in the new house is almost done.
meanings.sent3: After a day of sheetrocking, I feel like a wall-building pro!
meanings.sent4: The sheetrocking transformed the room into a blank canvas ready for paint.
meanings.sent5: I learned sheetrocking by watching tutorials online.

meanings.sent1: Proper sheetrocking ensures the walls look perfect.
meanings.sent2: The sheetrocking process involves sanding and painting.
meanings.sent3: I never knew how satisfying sheetrocking could be until I tried it.
meanings.sent4: The sheetrocking was like adding the final touch to a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The sheetrocking made the room feel complete and cozy.

meanings.sent1: His sheetrocking skills are unmatched; he can fix any wall flaw.
meanings.sent2: Learning sheetrocking repair can save you money on home maintenance.
meanings.sent3: I never thought I would enjoy sheetrocking repair, but it's oddly satisfying.
meanings.sent4: Her sheetrocking repair work was like magic, making the walls look brand new.
meanings.sent5: The sheetrocking repair made the room look as good as new.
